channel.title: Soft drink on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Soft drink on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Frooti Logo
Frooti is a mango-flavoured drink sold in India. It is made with natural flavours and mango-concentrate. It is the flagship product and most successful drink product made by Parle Agro. Frooti was launched in 1985 in Tetra Pak packaging, and is now also sold in PET bottles and rectangular shaped packs. Frooti is exported to the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Malaysia, Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, New Zealand, Australia, Mozambique, Ghana, Malawi, Zambia, Nigeria, Tanzania, Japan, and Ireland.
You can download theFrootilogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Frooti
item.description: Frooti is a mango-flavoured drink sold in India. It is made with natural flavours and mango-concentrate. It is the flagship product and most successful drink product made by Parle Agro. Frooti was launched in 1985 in Tetra Pak packaging, and is now also sold in PET bottles and rectangular shaped packs. Frooti is exported to the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Malaysia, Maldives, Singapore, Thailand, New Zealand, Australia, Mozambique, Ghana, Malawi, Zambia, Nigeria, Tanzania, Japan, and Ireland.
